issue.title: About logo icon doesn't denote chain type (?) in About/ Help message window/ dialog
issue.body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current behaviour

BitcoinQT shows the same about logo icon (orange colour) in all chain type instances, not being consistent with the task bar icon or initia/ start dialog:

![image](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/assets/110166421/63945955-2e29-4dc9-8a2e-2a5567983e9b)


### Expected behaviour

I think showing the correct icon (colour) that indicates the chain type as in the splash screen (first/ initial dialog when qt starts) and task bar app icon.

### Steps to reproduce

Run `bitcoin-qt` and `bitcoin-qt -regnet` (or `-signet`/ `-tesnet`), click on or press Alt-H and select "About Bitcoin Core", a window with the same title as of the previous selected menu item will popup showing the classic Bitcoin orange icon at the top left corner.

### Relevant log output

_No response_

### How did you obtain Bitcoin Core

Compiled from source

### What version of Bitcoin Core are you using?

v25.99

### Operating system and version

Ubuntu 22.04

### Machine specifications

_No response_
